Root.Name: Project
Budabot
Root.Description: Budabot is a next-generation chatbot designed to give your org members they tools they need to be successful in Anarchy Online.

Pages.Page: Special thanks to: -Derroylo (RK2), Sebuda (RK2), and Lucier (RK1) for creating the original Budabot. -Mindrila (RK1) for his large contributions to version 1.0. -Insanity-inc (RK2) for all the support and help they gave me when I first started developing Budabot modules and Capnsfix (RK2) for all of his ideas and suggestions. -Dark Ninjas (RK2), Devil Inside (RK2) and Conquered Dreams (RK2) for letting me use their orgs to test new features. -MajorOutage (RK1) for providing items db rips. -CaptainZero (RK1) and Greasegirl (RK2) for hosting and moderating the budabot.com website. -Mdkdoc420 (RK2) for coding, testing new features, and testing the AO Chat Proxy in a live environment. -Docteeko (RK2) for helping manage the Budabot project, testing new features and suggesting needed finishing touches. -Rosss (RK1) and Kinaton (RK1) for testing the release candidates, reporting bugs, and continuously giving great feedback. -All the people who have contributed modules, ideas, and bug reports to help make Budabot the best bot AO has ever seen.
